attributes.action: London Retail workers to be paid London Living Wage(£9.15/Hour)
attributes.additional_details:
IT has to be mandatory for all London retailers to pay minimum of (£9.15/Hours)London Living Wage to there Employees.
With 1000`s of employer already paying London Living Wage (http://www.livingwage.org.uk/) . Why not Food Retailer, Electronics and Technology Retailers cant do the same.
